materials 1 balinese rockstar cotton 2 hook 2 5 mm 3 stitch marker 4 scissors size � note special stitches � fpdc2tog 2 front post double_crochet together = yo insert hook around indicated from front to back to front yo pull up loop yo insert hook around next indicated from front to back to front yo pull up loop yo pull through all loops � bpdc back post double_crochet = yo insert hook around indicated from back to front to back yo pull up loop yo pull through all loops picot = chain 3 slip_stitch in 3rd loop from hook a instructions round 1 with a make magic_ring chain 3 11 double_crochet in ring join 12 double_crochet fasten_off a round 2 join b in any st chain 1 fpdc-2tog around same and next st chain 2 *fpdc-2tog 1st leg is around 2nd leg of prev fpdc-2tog 2nd is around next st chain 2 repeat from * around join 12 m fpdc-2tog 12 chain-2 sps fasten_off b round 3 join c in any chain-2 space working in chain space only skip others chain 3 count as double_crochet from now and throughout 3 double_crochet in same *4 double_crochet in next chain-2 space repeat from * around join 48 double_crochet fasten off c round 4 join d in any st chain 1 bpdc around same *bpdc around each st around join 48 bpdc do not fasten round 5 chain 1 single_crochet in same chain 3 skip 1 st *single_crochet in next st chain 3 skip 1 st repeat from * around join 24 single_crochet 24 chain-3 sps fasten_off d round 6 join e in any chain space working in chain space only skip others chain 1 single_crochet in same 5 double_crochet in next chain-3 sps place marker in 1st double_crochet *single_crochet in next chain space 5 double_crochet in next chain space repeat from * around join 12 single_crochet 60 double_crochet fasten_off e round 7 join f in marked st fpdc-2tog around same and next st chain 2 fpdc-2tog 1st leg around 2nd leg of previous fpdc-2tog and 2nd leg around next st chain 2 2x fpdc-2tog skip single_crochet * fpdc2tog chain 2 3x fpdc2tog skip single_crochet repeat from * around join 48 fpdc-2tog 36 chain-2 sps fasten_off f round 8 join g in any chain space working in chain space only skip others chain 3 2 double_crochet in same *3 double_crochet in next chain space repeat from * around join 108 double_crochet round 9 join h in any st chain 1 bpdc around same *bpdc around each st around join 108 bpdc do not fasten marwah mandala-design october 2022 w��
